short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick and tired of WhatsApp's horrendous background picture? Look no further, you can now customise it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By default, WhatsApp Web does not allow users to change their chat background. It only allows users to choose a colour. 

WarpsApp Web is a extension that helps you change your WhatsApp Web chat background. 

Made with love ðŸ’– by Reyes from Singapore.
